promptcards.card: Do you squeeze the end or middle of the toothpaste tube to get it out?
promptcards.certoaction: Write your least favorite word on the back of your hand with a permanent marker.

promptcards.card: Where is the furthest place you’ve traveled?
promptcards.certoaction: Write your least favorite word on the back of your hand with a permanent marker.

promptcards.card: Do you consider yourself a thinker or a feeler?
promptcards.certoaction: Write your least favorite word on the back of your hand with a permanent marker.

promptcards.card: Do you ever feel out of control?
promptcards.certoaction: Write your least favorite word on the back of your hand with a permanent marker.

promptcards.card: Do you prefer to have a listening ear or sound advice?
promptcards.certoaction: Wear your shirt either inside out or backwards for the rest of the game.

promptcards.card: What’s one thing people misconceive about you?
promptcards.certoaction: Lay on the floor and make snow angels until your next turn.

promptcards.card: Do you think the player to your left eats more or starves under stress?
promptcards.certoaction: Stand in the corner of the room facing the wall until your next turn.

promptcards.card: Everyone answer! How many hours of sleep do you get on average?

promptcards.certoaction: Whisper something romantic to no one in particular.

promptcards.card: Someone has told you to stop saying sorry and you’ve apologized.
promptcards.certoaction: Pick any word. Yell it loudly.
